Star interviews: Everyone wants to hear from Michael Vick and DeSean Jackson and Asante Samuel . That's the problem: their interviews are usually done in massive groups with serious reporters and lazy ones competing to get questions in.( How important is winning this week? Really?) It's not exactly conducive to revealing statements. Lesser-known players, who you might be able to actually have a conversation with, more often provided far deeper insight. The road: Great
